body:
Here's the near-useless [documentation](http://multiqc.info/docs/) 


```
user@node103[~/repos/spack]$ spack load -r py-multiqc                                                                                                                                                                                      
user@node103[~/repos/spack]$ multiqc c
Usage: multiqc [OPTIONS] <analysis directory>

Error: Invalid value for "analysis_dir": Path "c" does not exist.

This is MultiQC v1.0 (8939f77)

For more help, run 'multiqc --help' or visit http://multiqc.info

```
title: added py-multiqc and dependencies
